borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li>Site Location Plan,&nbsp;drawing number N.A/57WR/210, dated&nbsp;29/11/2023</li><li>Existing and Proposed Ground Floor Plans, drawing number&nbsp;N.A/57WR/201 [Issue A], dated 29/11/2023</li><li>Existing and Proposed First Floor Plans, drawing number N.A/57WR/202&nbsp;[Issue A], dated 29/11/2023</li><li>Existing and Proposed Second Floor Plans, drawing number N.A/57WR/203&nbsp;[Issue A], dated 29/11/2023</li><li>&nbsp;Existing and Proposed Roof Plans, drawing number N.A/57WR/204&nbsp;[Issue A], dated 29/11/2023</li><li>Existing and Proposed Front and Rear Elevations, drawing number N.A/57WR/205&nbsp;[Issue A], dated 29/11/2023</li><li>Existing and Proposed Side Elevations, drawing number N.A/57WR/206&nbsp;[Issue A], dated 29/11/2023</li><li>Existing and Proposed Section Plan, drawing number N.A/57WR/207&nbsp;[Issue A], dated 29/11/2023</li><li>Planning Statement, dated 29/11/2023</li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Construction of a single storey front infill extension to be used as a porch
